title: ❤️Beautiful Studio Floorplan Just For You❤️
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'Brand New Pet-Friendly Apartments', 'in Richfield, MN', 'Conveniently located in the heart of Richfield, MN, Novo Apartments offers studio, 1, and 2-bedroom apartment homes.', 'Enjoy luxurious and spacious floor plans with modern finishes, ample natural lighting, and panoramic views of the city.', 'Our trendy urban location is close to everything you need, including easy metro access, shopping, dining, and all of daily life conveniences!', 'Located one-half mile from Southdale Shopping Center.', 'Our new studio, one, one + den and two-bedroom apartment homes are near to shopping, entertainment, and transportation.', 'Our apartment homes have luxury finishes, stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, plank flooring, and custom cabinetry.', 'Our community is on 66th Avenue near Penn Avenue.', 'Our pet friendly apartments have an open-style kitchen with a w/d in your apartment.', ' Our patio has a pool, fire pits, a grilling area and putting green.', 'Our apartment homes are just minutes from many shopping areas and restaurants.', 'We offer a coffee bar, free WIFI in our common areas, indoor driving range, business center, multiuse/theater room and fitness center for your enjoyment.', 'Call to schedule a tour and our management team to treat you with remarkable service', 'Managed by CAPREIT', 'Phone:',
